name: CORP.ESCAPE
description:
Skład zespołu:

Michał Błaszczyk, Kasper Kocurek, Eliza Małecka, Konrad Sowisz, Bartosz Stochel.

Zespół znajduje się na parterze.

Escape your stressful job and hide in your comfy sanctuary! You have to get to the staircase located at the opposite corner of the floor. But watch out for managers, secretaries and personal development coaches, conversations with them can be really stressful! And when you get home... Nothing reliefs stress like admiring beautiful things you can buy with your hard earned money!

Controls:

Movement - WSAD/Arrow keys

Action - Space key
